data.name: [Code Golf] NightmareScript #6  (Rectangle into Squares) Squared
data.description:
-------
NightmareScript
-------
NightmareScript is JavaScript without alpha-numeric characters. 

The only permitted characters are:

! @ # $ % ^ & * ( ) _ + - |  < > . , ' ; : " ` ~ = ? /\ { } [ ]

New lines are permitted.
Spaces are not permitted.

--------
Squared
--------
Your solution must be in the form of a perfect square.


For example: 

8 lines with each line being 8 characters long. (not including new lines as characters)

------
Task
------

The drawing below gives an idea of how to cut a given rectangle into squares.

![](https://i.imgur.com/lk5vJ7sm.jpg)

Can you translate this drawing into an algorithm?

You will be given two dimensions

1. a positive integer length:  ```_```

2. a positive integer width:  ```__```

You will return an array with the size of the sides of each of the squares.

```  
$(5, 3) should return [3, 2, 1, 1]
$(3, 5) should return [3, 2, 1, 1]
  ```
  
If the length of the rectangle is equal to the width, you only need to return an array with either the length or width. 
Example:
```
$(5, 5) should return [5]
```



-----
Golf Rules
------
Max character length 71 (including newlines)




------
Credit
-----
credit to [g964](https://www.codewars.com/users/g964) for the original [Rectangle into Squares](https://www.codewars.com/kata/55466989aeecab5aac00003e) kata.
